sentences.sentence: And you'll see the derivations in your notes.
It is not because I favor derivations in class.
sentences.translation: 而不是我喜欢在课堂上讲推导。

sentences.sentence: All derivations of this word connect the bo ending of the word with the bow meaning “to bend.”
sentences.translation: 所有这个单词的衍生词，其结尾bo都与bow意思“弯曲”有关。
